body.p: The first newsletter for February, brings news of KDE 3.1, as well as the dramatic effect that it has on Gentoo's system of mirrors. Gentoo users on PowerPC hardware will be interested in this week's Featured Developer section which highlights Mark Guertin, the Senior Development Manager for Gentoo Linux/PPC. Plus, all the usual information, including Portage Watch, Bugzilla and Tips & Tricks.
